info.description: The Data Science Platform's source-of-truth service
info.title: Sherlock

get.description: List existing AppVersion entries, ordered by most recently updated.

parameters.description: Required when creating
parameters.name: appVersion

parameters.description: Required when creating
parameters.name: chart

parameters.description: An optional limit to the number of entries returned
parameters.name: limit

post.description: Create a new AppVersion entry. Note that fields are immutable after creation.

parameters.description: The AppVersion to create
parameters.name: app-version

get.description: Get an existing AppVersion entry via one its "selector"--its numeric ID.

parameters.description: The AppVersion to get's selector: name or numeric ID
parameters.name: selector

get.description: List existing ChartDeployRecord entries, ordered by most recently updated.

parameters.description: Required when creating
parameters.name: chartRelease

parameters.description: When creating, will default to the value currently held by the chart release
parameters.name: exactAppVersion

parameters.description: When creating, will default to the value currently held by the chart release
parameters.name: exactChartVersion

parameters.description: When creating, will default to the value currently held by the chart release
parameters.name: helmfileRef

parameters.description: An optional limit to the number of entries returned
parameters.name: limit

post.description: Create a new ChartDeployRecord entry. Note that fields are immutable after creation.

parameters.description: The ChartDeployRecord to create
parameters.name: chart-deploy-record

get.description: Get an existing ChartDeployRecord entry via one its "selector"--its numeric ID.

parameters.description: The ChartDeployRecord to get's selector: name or numeric ID
parameters.name: selector

get.description: List existing ChartRelease entries, ordered by most recently updated.

parameters.description: Required when creating
parameters.name: chart

parameters.description: When creating, will default the environment's default cluster, if provided. Either this or environment must be provided.
parameters.name: cluster

parameters.description: Calculated field
parameters.name: destinationType

parameters.description: Either this or cluster must be provided.
parameters.name: environment

parameters.description: When creating, will be calculated if left empty
parameters.name: name

parameters.description: When creating, will default to the environment's default namespace, if provided
parameters.name: namespace

parameters.description: When creating, will default to the app's main branch if it has one recorded
parameters.name: targetAppVersionBranch

parameters.description: When creating, will default to referencing any provided target app version field (exact, then commit, then branch)
parameters.name: targetAppVersionUse

parameters.description: When creating, will default to latest unless an exact target chart version is provided
parameters.name: targetChartVersionUse

parameters.description: An optional limit to the number of entries returned
parameters.name: limit

post.description: Create a new ChartRelease entry. Note that some fields are immutable after creation; /edit lists mutable fields.

parameters.description: The ChartRelease to create
parameters.name: chart-release

get.description: Get an existing ChartRelease entry via one of its "selectors": name, numeric ID, environment/chart, or cluster/namespace/chart.

parameters.description: The ChartRelease to get's selector: name or numeric ID
parameters.name: selector

delete.description: Delete an existing ChartRelease entry via one of its "selectors": name, numeric ID, environment/chart, or cluster/namespace/chart.

parameters.description: The ChartRelease to delete's selector: name or numeric ID
parameters.name: selector

patch.description: Edit an existing ChartRelease entry via one of its "selectors": name, numeric ID, environment/chart, or cluster/namespace/chart. Note that only mutable fields are available here, immutable fields can only be set using /create.

parameters.description: The ChartRelease to edit's selector: name or numeric ID
parameters.name: selector

parameters.description: The edits to make to the ChartRelease
parameters.name: chart-release

get.description: List existing Cluster entries, ordered by most recently updated.

parameters.description: Required when creating
parameters.name: address

parameters.description: Required when creating if providers is 'azure'
parameters.name: azureSubscription

parameters.description: Required when creating
parameters.name: base

parameters.description: Required when creating if provider is 'google'
parameters.name: googleProject

parameters.description: Required when creating
parameters.name: name

parameters.description: An optional limit to the number of entries returned
parameters.name: limit

post.description: Create a new Cluster entry. Note that some fields are immutable after creation; /edit lists mutable fields.

get.description: List existing Environment entries, ordered by most recently updated.

parameters.description: Required when creating
parameters.name: base

parameters.description: Upon creation of a dynamic environment, if this is true the template's chart releases will be copied to the new environment
parameters.name: chartReleasesFromTemplate

parameters.description: When creating, will be calculated if dynamic, required otherwise
parameters.name: name

parameters.description: When creating, will be set to your email
parameters.name: owner

parameters.description: Required for dynamic environments
parameters.name: templateEnvironment

parameters.description: An optional limit to the number of entries returned
parameters.name: limit

post.description:
Create a new Environment entry. Note that some fields are immutable after creation; /edit lists mutable fields.
Creating a dynamic environment based on a template will also copy ChartReleases from the template.

parameters.description: The Environment to create
parameters.name: environment

get.description: Get an existing Environment entry via one of its "selectors": name or numeric ID.

parameters.description: The Environment to get's selector: name or numeric ID
parameters.name: selector

delete.description: Delete an existing Environment entry via one of its "selectors": name or numeric ID.

parameters.description: The Environment to delete's selector: name or numeric ID
parameters.name: selector

patch.description: Edit an existing Environment entry via one of its "selectors": name or numeric ID. Note that only mutable fields are available here, immutable fields can only be set using /create.

parameters.description: The Environment to edit's selector: name or numeric ID
parameters.name: selector

parameters.description: The edits to make to the Environment
parameters.name: environment

get.description: Validate a given AppVersion selector and provide any other selectors that would match the same AppVersion.

get.description: Get Sherlock's understanding of the calling user based on IAP and the Firecloud.org Google Workspace organization.
get.summary: Get information about the calling user

get.description:
Get Sherlock's current status. Right now, this endpoint always returned OK (if the server is online).
This endpoint is acceptable to use for a readiness check.
Get the build version of this Sherlock instance.

exactAppVersion.description: When creating, will default to the value currently held by the chart release

exactChartVersion.description: When creating, will default to the value currently held by the chart release

helmfileRef.description: When creating, will default to the value currently held by the chart release

cluster.description: When creating, will default the environment's default cluster, if provided. Either this or environment must be provided.

environment.description: Either this or cluster must be provided.

name.description: When creating, will be calculated if left empty

namespace.description: When creating, will default to the environment's default namespace, if provided

targetAppVersionBranch.description: When creating, will default to the app's main branch if it has one recorded

targetAppVersionUse.description: When creating, will default to referencing any provided target app version field (exact, then commit, then branch)

targetChartVersionUse.description: When creating, will default to latest unless an exact target chart version is provided
